page.title: 17LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: Survey carried out to find how parents spend their leisure and recreation time.210 sheets sent out 169 returned. Survey showed; Watching T.V. 144 D.I.Y. 114 Gardening 107 Reading 96 Hobbies 94 Walking 70 Spectator sports 58 Active sports 54 Other activities 41 Clubs 30 Church activities 12 Night school 11 Bingo 11 Active sports showed swimming,golf football,cycling,squash ans darts most popular,but included fencing,jogging. Most popular hobbies sewing,knitting, beer and wine making,also brass bands.
